property.name: Text
property.value: ι After you defeat an enemy: Discover 1 clue at your location. (Limit once per round.) ε effect: +1 for each clue on your location.

property.name: Text
property.value: You may take an additional action during your turn, which can only be used on Tome η abilities. ε effect: +0. If you succeed, draw 1 card for each Tome you control.

property.name: Text
property.value: θ During your turn, spend 2 resources: You may take an additional action this turn. (Limit once per turn.) ε effect: +2. If you succeed, gain 2 resources.

property.name: Text
property.value: ι After 1 or more horror is placed on Agnes Baker: Deal 1 damage to an enemy at your location. (Limit once per phase.) ε effect: +1 for each horror on Agnes Baker.

property.name: Text
property.value: ι When you reveal a chaos token, choose and discard 1 card from your hand: Cancel that chaos token and return it to the bag. Reveal a new chaos token. (Limit once per test/ability.) ε effect: +0. If Wendy's Amulet is in play, you automatically succeed instead.

property.name: Text
property.value: Roland Banks deck only. Uses (4 ammo). η Spend 1 ammo: Fight. You get +1 ή for this attack (if there are 1 or more clues on your location, you get +3 ή, instead). This attack deals +1 damage.

property.name: Text
property.value: Revelation - Put Cover Up into play in your threat area, with 3 clues on it. ι When you would discover 1 or more clues at your location: Discard that many clues from Cover Up instead. Forced - When the game ends, if there are any clues on Cover Up: You suffer 1 mental trauma.

property.name: Text
property.value: Daisy Walker deck only. You have 2 additional hand slots, which can only be used to hold Tome assets.

property.name: Text
property.value: Revelation - Put The Necronomicon into play in your threat area, with 3 horror on it. It cannot leave play while it has 1 or more horror on it. Treat each ε you reveal on a chaos token as a [fail]. η: Move 1 horror from The Necronomicon to Daisy Walker. Then, if The Necronomicon has no horror on it, discard it.

property.name: Text
property.value: Fast. Play after your turn begins.Until the end of the round, non-Elite enemies cannot attack you.

property.name: Text
property.value: Revelation - Put Hospital Debts into play in your threat area. θ: Move 1 resource from your resource pool to Hospital Debts. (Limit twice per round.) Forced - When the game ends, if Hospital Debts has fewer than 6 resources on it: You earn 2 fewer experience for this scenario.

property.name: Text
property.value: Agnes Baker deck only. ι After you play a spell card: Draw 1 card.

property.name: Text
property.value: Place 1 doom on the current agenda. This effect may cause the current agenda to advance. Forced - If Dark Memory is in your hand at the end of your turn, reveal it and take 2 horror.

property.name: Text
property.value: Wendy Adams deck only. You may play the topmost event in your discard pile as if it were in your hand. Forced - After you play an event: Place it on the bottom of your deck instead of in your discard pile.

property.name: Text
property.value: Revelation - Take 2 direct horror and remove all cards in your discard pile from the game.

property.name: Text
property.value: Uses (4 ammo). η Spend 1 ammo: Fight. You get +1 ή for this attack. This attack deals +1 damage.

property.name: Text
property.value: η: Fight. You get +1 ή for this attack. If the attacked enemy is the only enemy engaged with you, this attack deals +1 damage.

property.name: Text
property.value: ι When an enemy attack deals damage to Guard Dog: Deal 1 damage to the attacking enemy.

property.name: Text
property.value: Fast. Play after you defeat an enemy. Discover 1 clue in your location.

property.name: Text
property.value: Fast. Play when an enemy attacks an investigator at your location. Cancel that attack.

property.name: Text
property.value: Choose either your location or a connecting location. Deal 3 damage to each enemy and to each investigator at the chosen location.

property.name: Text
property.value: If this skill test is successful during an attack, that attack deals +1 damage.

property.name: Text
property.value: Place 3 ammo tokens on a Firearm asset controlled by an investigator at your location.

property.name: Text
property.value: You get +1 ά. θ While an investigator at your location is taking his or her turn, discard Police Badge: That investigator may take 2 additional actions this turn.

property.name: Text
property.value: You get +1 ή. θ Exhaust Beat Cop and deal 1 damage to it: Deal 1 damage to an enemy at your location.

property.name: Text
property.value: Uses (2 ammo). η Spend 1 ammo: Fight. You get +3 ή for this attack. Instead of its standard damage, this attack deals 1 damage for each point you succeed by (to a minimum of 1, to a maximum of 5). If you fail and would damage another investigator, this attack deals 1 damage for each point you fail by (to a minimum of 1, to a maximum of 5).

property.name: Text
property.value: Fast. You get +1 έ while investigating.

property.name: Text
property.value: η Exhaust Old Book of Lore: Choose an investigator at your location. That investigator searches the top 3 cards of his or her deck for a card, draws it, and shuffles the remaining cards into his or her deck.

property.name: Text
property.value: ι After Research Librarian enters play: Search your deck for a Tome asset and add it to your hand. Shuffle your deck.

property.name: Text
property.value: You get +1 έ. ι After you successfully investigate: Gain 1 resource.

property.value: θ Spend 1 resource: You get +1 έ for this skill test. θ Spend 1 resource: You get +1 ί for this skill test.

property.value: Uses (3 charges). η Exhaust Scrying and spend 1 charge: Look at the top 3 cards of any investigator's deck or the encounter deck. Return them to the top of that deck in any order.

property.name: Text
property.value: While Stubborn Detective is at your location, treat your investigator as if his or her printed text box were blank (except for Traits).

property.name: Text
property.value: α -X. X is the number of Ghoul enemies at your location. β -1. If you fail, take 1 horror. γ -2. If there is a Ghoul enemy at your location, take 1 damage.

property.name: Text
property.value: α -2. If you fail, after this skill test, search the encounter deck and discard pile for a Ghoul enemy, and draw it. Shuffle the encounter deck.β Reveal another token. If you fail, take 2 horror.γ -4. If there is a Ghoul enemy at your location, take 1 damage and 1 horror.

property.name: Text
property.value: The lead investigator must decide (choose one): Either each investigator discards 1 card at random from his or her hand, or the lead investigator takes 2 horror.

property.name: Text
property.value: Shuffle the encounter discard pile into the encounter deck. Discard cards from the top of the encounter deck until a Ghoul enemy is discarded. The lead investigator draws that enemy.

property.name: Text
property.value: Forced - At the end of the enemy phase: Each unengaged Ghoul enemy moves 1 location towards the Parlor. Forced - At the end of the round: Place 1 doom on this agenda for each Ghoul enemy in the Hallway or Parlor.

property.name: Text
property.value: If the investigators are at Act 1 or 2, they are trapped inside the house as the ghouls tear them apart (R3).If the investigators are at Act 3, they barely escape with their lives, allowing the ghouls to run rampant. Each investigator who has not resigned is defeated and suffers 1 physical trauma.

property.name: Text
property.value: Put into play the set-aside Hallway, Cellar, Attic, and Parlor.Discard each enemy in the Study.Place each investigator in the Hallway.Remove the Study from the game.

property.name: Text
property.value: Objective - When the round ends, investigators in the hallway may, as a group, spend the requisite number of clues to advance.

property.name: Text
property.value: The barrier blocking the passage into the Parlor has vanished. Reveal the Parlor.Put the set-aside Lita Chandler into play in the Parlor.Spawn the set-aside Ghoul Priest in the Hallway.

property.name: Text
property.value: Objective - If the Ghoul Priest is Defeated, advance.

property.name: Text
property.value: The lead investigator must decide (choose one):It was never much of a home. Burn it down! (R1)This "hell-pit" is my home! No way we are burning it! (R2)

property.name: Text
property.value: Forced - After you enter the Attic: Take 1 horror.

property.name: Text
property.value: Forced - After you enter the Cellar: Take 1 damage.

property.name: Text
property.value: η Resign. "This is too much for me!" You run out the front door, fleeing in panic. While Lita Chantler is not controlled by a player, she gains: "Parlay. Test έ (4). If you succeed, take control of Lita Chantler.

property.name: Text
property.value: While you control Lita Chantler, she gains: "Each investigator at your location gets +1 ή. ι When an investigator at your location successfully attacks a Monster enemy: That investigator deals +1 damage."

property.name: Text
property.value: α -X. X is the highest number of doom on a Cultist enemy in play. β -2. Place 1 doom on the nearest cultist enemy.γ -3. If you fail, place 1 of your clues on your location.

property.name: Text
property.value: α -X. X is the total number of doom in play.β -2. Place 1 doom on each Cultist enemy in play. If there are no Cultist enemies in play, reveal another token.γ -4. If you fail, place all your clues on your location.

property.name: Text
property.value: η: Resign. You don't want to risk taking too long, so you head to safety with the information you've gathered.

property.value: Spawn - Engaged with prey.Prey - Most Clues.Hunter.

property.name: Text
property.value: η: Resign. You don't want to risk taking too long, so you head to safety with the information you've gathered.

property.name: Text
property.value: η The investigators spend 2 clues per investigator, as a group: Draw the top card of the Cultist deck.Objective - Find as many unique Cultist enemies as you can and add them to the victory display. If there are 6 unique Cultist enemies in the victory display, advance. (Note: not all 6 of them are in the Cultist deck.)

property.name: Text
property.value: Forced - When the Ghoul Priest spawns: Spawn it here instead of at its normal location.η Draw 1 card and gain 1 resource. (Limit once per turn.)

property.value: η: Gain 3 resources. (Limit once per game.)

property.name: Text
property.value: η: Heal 3 horror. (Limit once per game.)

property.name: Text
property.value: While you are in Easttown, reduce the cost of each Ally asset you play by 2.

property.value: Forced - After you enter the Graveyard:Test ά (3). If you fail, you must either take 2 horror or move to Rivertown.

property.value: Revelation - If you have no clues, False Lead gains surge. If you have 1 or more clues, test έ (4). For each point you fail, place 1 of your clues on your location.

property.value: Forced - When Wolf-man Drew attacks: Heal 1 damage from him.

property.value: η Choose and discard 4 cards from your hand:Parley. Add Herman Collins to the victory display.

property.name: Text
property.value: η Spend 5 resources: Parlay. Add Victoria Devereux to the victory display.

property.name: Text
property.value: Forced - After Ruth Turner is evaded: Add her to the victory display.

property.value: α -3. If you fail, after this skill test, search the encounter deck and discard pile for a Monster enemy, and draw it. Shuffle the encounter deck.β -4. Place 2 doom on the nearest enemy.γ -5. If there is a Monster enemy at your location, take 1 damage and 1 horror.δ -7. If there is an Ancient One enemy in play, reveal another token.

property.name: Text
property.value: Shuffle the encounter discard pile into the encounter deck and discard cards from the top until a Monster enemy is discarded. Spawn that enemy at the Main Path. Then, place 1 doom on that enemy.

property.name: Text
property.value: Each enemy gets +1 fight and +1 evade.

property.name: Text
property.value: In player order, each investigator must test ά (6). Each investigator who fails must search the collection for a random basic Madness weakness and add it to his or her hand.

property.name: Text
property.value: Fored - When this agenda advances:If the investigators are at Act 1, put the set-aside Ritual Site into play and spawn the set-aside Umordhoth there.If the investigators are at Act 2 or 3, discard all enemies at the Ritual Site and spawn the set-aside Umordhoth there.

property.name: Text
property.value: Revelation - Replace the current Act and Agenda with The Devourer Below. This card is both the current Act and the current Agenda.Objective - If Umordhoth is defeated, (R2).

property.name: Text
property.value: Put the set-aside Ritual Site into play if it is not already in play.Search the collection for each enemy recorded in your Campaign Log under "Cultists Who Got Away," and spawn those enemies at the Main Path.

property.name: Text
property.value: Objective - If an investigator enters the Ritual Site, advance.

property.name: Text
property.value: Shuffle the encounter discard pile into the encounter deck. Discard cards from the top of the encounter deck until 1 enemy is discarded (2 enemies instead if there are 3 or more players in the game). Spawn each discarded enemy at the Ritual Site.

property.name: Text
property.value: η Spend 1 clue: Test ά (3) or ί (3). If you succeed, place 1 clue on this Act.Objective - If there are 2 clues per investigator on this Act, advance.

property.name: Text
property.value: The Main Path is connected to each other Woods location. η: Resign. "There's nothing we can do for them!" You flee from the woods, leaving Arkham to its grisly fate.

property.name: Text
property.value: Forced - After you enter this location: Test ά (4). If you fail, take 1 damage and 1 horror.

property.name: Text
property.value: Forced - When you move out of this location: Test έ (3). If you fail, cancel the effects of the move.

property.value: This location is investigated using ά instead of the skill indicated by the investigation attempt.

property.value: This location is investigated using ή instead of the skill indicated by the investigation attempt.

property.name: Text
property.value: Forced - At the end of the round, if there are fewer than 2 clues per investigator on Ritual Site: add clues to it until it has 2 clues per investigator on it.

property.name: Text
property.value: Umordhoth gets +4 health per investigator.Forced - At the end of each investigator's turn: Ready Umordhoth.η If you control Lita Chandler: "It's only after her!" You throw Lita to Umordhoth in order to spare your lives. (R3)

property.name: Text
property.value: Revelation - Test ά (5). For each point you fail by, you must either (choose one): Choose and discard a card from your hand, or take 1 damage and 2 horror.

property.name: Text
property.value: Revelation - Test ί (3). For each point you fail by, take 1 damage.

property.name: Text
property.value: Revelation - Test ά (3). For each point you fail by, take 1 horror.

property.name: Text
property.value: Revelation - Put Frozen in Fear into play in your threat area. The first time you perform one of the following actions (move, fight, or evade) each round, it costs 1 additional action. Forced - At the end of your turn: Test ά (3). If you succeed, discard Frozen in Fear.

property.name: Text
property.value: Revelation - Put Dissonant Voices into play in your threat area. You cannot play assets or events. Forced - At the end of the round: Discard Dissonant Voices.

property.name: Text
property.value: Revelation - Place 1 doom on the current agenda. This effect may cause the current agenda to advance.

property.name: Text
property.value: Revelation - Test ά (4). If you fail, choose and discard 1 asset you control (if you cannot, take 2 damage instead).

property.name: Text
property.value: Revelation - Attach to your location. Limit 1 per location. Attached location gets +2 shroud. Forced - After attached location is successfully investigated: Discard Obscuring Fog.

property.name: Text
property.value: Spawn - Any empty location. Forced - After Acolyte enters play: Place 1 doom on it.

property.name: Text
property.value: Forced - At the end of the mythos phase: Place 1 doom on Wizard of the Order.

property.name: Text
property.value: Revelation - Place 2 doom on the nearest Cultist enemy. If there are no Cultist enemies in play, search the encounter deck and discard pile for a Cultist enemy and draw it. Shuffle the encounter deck.

property.name: Text
property.value: While attempting to evade Hunting Nightgaunt, double the negative modifier of each revealed chaos token.

property.name: Text
property.value: Revelation - Test ί (4). If you fail, take 1 damage and 1 horror. Then, disengage from each non-Nightgaunt enemy engaged with you and move to a Central location.

property.name: Text
property.value: Revelation - Attach to the location with the most clues, and without a Locked Door attached.The attached location cannot be investigated.η: Test ή (4) to break down the door or ί (4) to pick the locks. If you succeed, discard Locked Door.

property.name: Text
property.value: While engaged with an investigator with remaining sanity 4 or fewer, Screeching Byakhee gets +1 fight and +1 evade.

property.name: Text
property.value: Revelation - Test ά (4). If you fail, take 2 horror and search your deck for a Madness weakness. Draw that card and shuffle your deck.

property.name: Text
property.value: Forced - When Yithian Observer attacks you: Discard 1 card at random from your hand. If you cannot, Yithian Observer deals +1 damage and +1 horror for this attack.

property.name: Text
property.value: Revelation - You must either (choose one):Draw 2 cards and place 2 doom on the current agenda (this effect can cause the agenda to advance), or take 2 horror.

property.name: Text
property.value: Forced - At the end of the round: Heal 2 damage from Relentless Dark Young.

property.name: Text
property.value: Forced - When Goat Spawn is defeated: Each investigator at this location takes 1 horror.

property.name: Text
property.value: Forced - After Young Deep One engages you: Take 1 horror.
